Culture</span></a></h2></div><a href="https://www.nbcnews.com/nbc-out/out-pop-culture/will-harper-will-ferrell-harper-steele-snl-netflix-rcna172664"><h2 class="wide-tease-item__headline" data-testid="wide-tease-headline">In &#x27;Will &amp; Harper,&#x27; comedian Will Ferrell meets an old friend for the first time</h2></a><div class="df"><div class="wide-tease-item__description" data-testid="wide-tease-dek">The Netflix documentary follows “SNL” alums Ferrell and Harper Steele on a two-week road trip to find out how coming out as transgender can change a friendship.</div><div I freelanced for The New York Times and the Los Angeles Times while earning a B.A. in political science at UCLA. I was a regular at Santa Monica and Beverly Hills City Council meetings for the L.A. Times and — after an arts beat internship there — I stuck around during my senior year and successfully begged to be deployed during the Los Angeles riots. I ended up as a minor part of the team that won a Pulitzer Prize for breaking news coverage. I went to The Philadelphia Inquirer after school and soon returned to the Times as a staff writer specializing in youth culture and pop music. I worked as a staff writer at two magazines before settling in at LA Weekly as a daily news reporter for eight years. In 2006 I was recognized for investigative reporting by the nonprofit New America Media Awards for a story on Latinos vociferously opposed to those who come to the United States illegally. In the 2010s, I was a finalist multiple times for the title of online journalist of the year, bestowed by the Los Angeles Press Club. ","Maximum sustained winds have been measured at 90 mph, far above the 74 mph required for Category 1 hurricane status, the center said.","While it continued to strengthen amid the Atlantic’s warm water, Isaac’s expected path to the northeast will put it over cooler water, and it was expected to weaken to a post-tropical cyclone by Monday, federal forecasters said.","It’s existence in a desolate part of the Atlantic means it’s unlikely to wreak havoc for people, though it could generate life-threatening surf for the Azores, they said.","The other storm is Tropical Storm Joyce, which was 1,205 miles east of the Northern Leeward Islands, according to the hurricane center’s 11 p.m. public advisory for the storm.","It was moving west-northwest at 12 mph and was maintaining its strength level of 50 mph maximum sustained winds, the center said.
